All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Controller
Interface for controllers
CursedDice
CursedDice is a custom dice class that modifies the probabilities of rolling certain values.
DeckScreenController
The controller class for managing the deck screen in the dice game application.
Dice
Abstract base class for creating different types of dice with customizable probabilities.
DiceDeck
Represents a collection of dice, referred to as a deck, that can be rolled together.
DiceTest
 
EndingOfTurn
 
FirstScreenController
Controller class for the first screen of the dice game application.
Game
The main game class that manages the core game logic, player and NPC interactions, turn management, and scoring system.
GameClient
 
GameClient.ScoreUpdate
 
GameClient.TurnRequest
 
GameDatabase
Singleton class that handles all database operations for the game.
GameDatabase.PlayerData
A helper class used for serializing the player data.
GameObserver
Interface for game observers
GameScreenController
Controller class for managing the game screen UI and interactions.
GameScreenController.Position
Represents a position with x and y coordinates
GameTest
 
HumanPlayer
Represents a human player in the game, storing player-specific details like name, dice deck, balance, and current bet, and providing functionality to roll dice.
LuckyDice
Represents a special type of Dice called LuckyDice.
MainApplication
The main entry point for the Dice Game application.
MainScreenController
Controller class for the main screen of the dice game application.
NPC
NPC (Non-Player Character) class represents an automated player in the dice game.
NPCService
 
Player
Abstract class representing a player in the game, storing player-specific details like name, dice deck, balance, and current bet, and providing functionality to roll dice.
PlayerAdapter<T extends Player>
 
PlayerService
Singleton service class responsible for managing the player's data and dice deck.
PlayerTest
 
RegularDice
RegularDice represents a standard, fair die with equal probabilities for each side.
RemotePlayerAdapter
 
RiskDice
Represents a special type of dice that has an associated risk number.
RoyalDice
A specialized dice class that extends `RiskDice` and introduces a special behavior for rolling a 1, granting double points but also applying a penalty to the balance.
ScoreCalculatorService
 
Skin
Represents the different skins available for the game.
SomeGameFieldsMissing
Exception for missing game fields
StoryScreenController
Controller class for the story screen in the game.
Turn
Represents a turn in the game, including the score, the result of the turn, the selected dice, the remaining dice, and the displayed dice.
WrongProbavilitiesSetUp
Exception for wrong probabilities
